instructions: Are events A and B mutually exclusive?
question:
A coin is tossed six times.

  • A: The first three flips come up heads
  • B: The last three flips come up tails
explanation:
Correct

HHHTTT is an outcome in which the first three flips come up heads and the last three flips come up tails. Therefore the intersection of the two events is not empty.
